review: Works great for the most part. I love being able to cast almost anything from my phone. It's nice not having to keep a separate remote around and being able to control any TV in our house. The reason I deducted a star is because it frequently drops the stream at times. I've seen this happen most often with ESPN where as the Roku 3 never drops it despite being farther from the wireless access point.

review: Can be useful for the simple things such as Hulu, Netflix, and Youtube but a bit annoying requiring a secondary device for everything. Slingplayer absolutely sucks streaming on this. It's very clearly the Sling media software though.For the price you really can't beat throwing these on a couple TV's in the house, but it lacks in certains areas where other TV devices excel.Would love to get one of these with a more powerful wireless device capable of higher speeds.
